code: import React from"react";import{Chart as ChartJS,ArcElement,Tooltip,Legend}from'chart.js';import{Pie}from'react-chartjs-2';import'./PieGraph.css';import{Container}from'react-bootstrap';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";ChartJS.register(ArcElement,Tooltip,Legend);var PieGraph=function PieGraph(_ref){var chartData=_ref.chartData;var data={labels:['A','B','C','D','F'],datasets:[{label:'Grade Distribution',data:[chartData.A,chartData.B,chartData.C,chartData.D,chartData.F],backgroundColor:['rgba(0, 128, 0, 0.7)','rgba(0, 0, 255, 0.7)','rgba(255, 165, 0, 0.7)','rgba(255, 255, 0, 0.7)','rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.7)']}]};var options={plugins:{title:{display:true,text:'Grade Distribution Pie Graph',font:{size:16,weight:'bold'}}}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Container,{className:"pie-graph-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Pie,{className:"pie-graph",data:data,options:options})})});};export default PieGraph;
